name: Avner
description:
You've received a mysterious message on your computer from an unknown source. Who is it? Why are they contacting you? Featuring multiple endings, it's up to you which way the story goes.

This is a Twine game, which is a format not well-optimized in this window. It is recommended that you play it in your browser through the link below or download the HTML file.

PLAY THE GAME ONLINE AT www.katieyuen.ca/AVNER.html

or, download the HTML file to play in your browser.
